name: Athos (itch)
description:
In 1877, the city was invaded by a foreign country and the whole population was imprisoned. A single boy by the name of "Athos" managed to escape and by risking his own life, he wants to try and set the rest of his country free.

Athos infiltrates the prison in order to help his companions escape. Will he be able to get them out by himself? Or maybe, he will utilize them and their position for his benefit.
